GED. Overview: description: US-based Grade 12 equivalency certificate; examFormat: Computer-based, instant results, conducted at Pearson VUE centers.. CourseStructure: totalClasses: 150; classDuration: 1.5 hours; weeklyClasses: 10 classes/week (5 days); mockTests: 10; solveClasses: 5; practiceTests: 12. Features: Authorized GED prep center in Dhaka & Chattogram; Certified faculty trained by GED Testing Service; GED-aligned resources & mocks; Intensive care and doubt classes for weak students; One-stop service: classes, mocks, registration, final exam, credential. TestCenters: Kalabagan; Banani; Mirpur; Uttara Campus 1; Uttara Campus 2; Chattogram. HowToApply: online: https://mentors.com.bd/education-apply-online/; phone: 09610883388. How to buy: Type: callOrWebsite | On-campus: Call or visit a Mentors branch.. remarks: It is only on campus course and if you wanto to buy this course first you will be permitted by mentors permission.

Technical support issue 1: Login: Try resetting your password. If the problem persists, contact our support at 09610883388.
Technical support issue 2: Payment: Use SSLCommerz or bKash. If payment fails, contact our support at 09610883388.
Technical support issue 3: Course Access: Make sure you're logged in with the correct account. For any issues, call 09610883388.
Technical support issue 4: How to join live class: first go to the website/app and login with your account. then go to the my Learning page you want to join and click on the live class button.
Technical support issue 5: Technical Issues: For any technical issues, please contact our support team at 09610883388.
Technical support issue 6: Mock Test schedules: If you're experiencing technical issues with the mock test schedules, please call 09610883388.
Technical support issue 7: Downloading Course Certificate: login website and go myLerning page and click on the course certificate, please call 09610883388.
Technical support issue 8: For all technical problems, always contact our support team at 09610883388 or visit any Branch.

Batch schedule info: To check our current batch schedules, please visit url: https://mentors.com.bd/batch_schedule On this page, you can select your preferred branch and course to see all running batches. This will provide you with the most up-to-date information about available batches, schedules, and start dates.
